mapper.sql: p.id, p.title, p.content, p.in_date, u.nick_name, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM post_likes WHERE post_id = p.id) AS count_likes, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM post_comments WHERE post_id = p.id) AS count_comments
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM post p JOIN user u ON p.user_fk = u.id ORDER BY p.in_date DESC

SELECT
FROM post p JOIN user u ON p.user_fk = u.id WHERE p.category = #{category} ORDER BY p.in_date DESC

SELECT
FROM post p JOIN user u ON p.user_fk = u.id WHERE p.title LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{search}, '%') OR p.content LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{search}, '%') OR u.nick_name LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{search}, '%') ORDER BY p.in_date DESC
